author: rgerosa
body:
This pull request wants to push in release the latest si-strip commissioning workflow updates performed in 2018 for the analysis of spy-channel data, as well as the analysis of calibration runs and scans. 

These changes should not affect any production workflow but are exclusive to the strip detector commissioning in P5, i.e. analysis of si-strip tracker local runs used to calibrate the detector.
title: Si-Strip commissioning developments in 2018
